attributes.additional_details: The current system is unfair and discriminated against individuals who have been frugal and hardworking throughout their lives and managed to have even meagre savings and own their own property.
attributes.background: Want Government to produce legislation that makes access to basic residential and nursing care free to all UK nationals.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319117
